summary: An airline appeals the Department’s assessment of service and other activities B&O tax on compensation for collecting passenger facility charges, . . .deferred sales tax on upgrades to its boarding facilities at two airports in Washington, and [use tax on] complimentary non-alcoholic beverages provided to customers in Washington. We grant the petition as to [passenger facility charges], concluding federal law preempts the taxation of such revenues, but deny the remainder of the petition.
